If you tried to update to a revision higher then 3022 and encounter the following SVN error in this folder:

External failed: X:\Package\res_apk\InAppBilling\skt\res 
Error: The node Error: 'X:\Package\res_apk\InAppBilling\skt\res\res_apk\InAppBilling\skt\res\drawable\background.9.png' 
Error: is not installable 

please delete the res folder and update again.
